text:
Strange Confessions

Dimly lit room, tense atmosphere  
Raskolnikov smirks, eyes glinting  
Raskolnikov: “You find me curious, do you?”  
Zametov: “Yes, curious.”  

---  

Cluttered table, papers scattered everywhere  
Raskolnikov leans in, whispering  
Raskolnikov: “I was searching for news of the murder.”  
Zametov: “What if you have been reading about it?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov confesses to Zametov that he has been searching for news about the murder of the old pawnbroker woman.
